item.description:
Inviting Mary to Purify Your Life
a workshop with Mother Clare Watts

Saturday, June 14 from 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.

Her purity has been questioned, feared, and revered. She has appeared across the world, in places such as Guadalupe, Lourdes, Fatima, and Mejdugorje, with imploring messages that her witnesses dedicate themselves to praying for peace on the Earth. She is regarded as ?Our Lady? to millions. She is the perfect representation of the Divine Feminine. She is the Mother of the Christ. She is the Arc of the Covenant. In this seminar, discover for yourself this magnificent Soul, and find out how knowing her and having a relationship with her will pave the road to a deep and lasting relationship with the God within your own being.

** lunch will be served **

Mother Clare Watts is a mystic, ordained priest, Master Teacher of Christian mysticism, and co-director of a mystical Christian Order, a school with 13 Centers of Light in cities across the country. She holds a Master's Degree in Counseling Psychology, with extensive post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, is a Certified Professional Midwife, and has enjoyed successful careers in both fields. She is the mother of four grown children, and currently lives in Dolores, Colorado, where she directs the effort to build the Sophia Peace Center.
item.how_to_find_us: The Center of Light in Jamaica Plain is located just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the Orange line.
item.name: Inviting Mother Mary to Purify Your Life
